long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SonyLiv Video Watch Party chrome extension that lets you watch your favorite SonyLiv shows, movies, and sports along with your friends even if they are not nearby. This feature allows you to begin a watch party instantly and see SonyLiv content simultaneously while having the ability to coordinate playback and discuss in real time.  

Whether you are going for a virtual movie night, a Netflix marathon or watching live sports, this extension will help you share the exhilaration with your friends and family. Enjoy a smooth and entertaining means of interacting as you both watch SonyLiv content at the same time regardless the geographical differences.

Key Features of this Chrome Extension 

One-Click Watch Party: Watch your favourite shows and movies on SonyLiv with friends in a watch party without the need for any configuration. 
 

Real-Time Syncing: Synchronization makes it possible for all viewers to watch the content at the same time without lagging. 
 

Built-In Chat Feature: Converse with your friends during the video to allow for a live reaction and discussion in case of a video. 
 

Compatible Across Devices: In general, it works perfectly fine on any device that supports SonyLiv and that makes reaching out to friends possible from anywhere. 
 

How To Use in Simple Steps 

Step 1: Installation of the Extension 

Go to your browser store and download the SonyLiv Video Watch Party extension then install it. 

Step 2: Open SonyLiv 

Open the website of SonyLiv and choose the video content which you would like to share with your friends. 

Step 3: Start a Watch Party 

Click on the icon located on the upper right corner of the screen and then select the watch party option. You will get a unique watch party link. 

Step 4: Share the Link  

After the form is successfully created, the link should be shared with its participants for them to access it easily. 

Share the link of the watch party to your friends. After they join in you will all be able to watch in real time. 

Step 5: Enjoy and Chat 

View the content at the same time and have the playback in perfect sync and use the chat feature to discuss as you watch. 

 

For Whom It Is Useful 

The SonyLiv Video Watch Party extension is most suitable for anyone who enjoys watching SonyLiv content with friends or family members, yet the people cannot sit together. Whether it is a student who wants to spend time with friends, a couple that is in a long-distance relationship and enjoys watching TV shows together or maybe a family which lives in different cities and cities who like watching movies and sports together, this extension unites everyone. 
 

Why It Is Useful 
 
So often in today’s society it becomes difficult to speak with our families and friends; let alone when we are separated by distance. The SonyLiv Video Watch Party extension enables people to make shared experiences possible through the virtual watch parties thus strengthening relationships despite the geographical barriers. It is not only about watching a video on the same screen, it is about making memories, having a laugh or watching the video at the same time and being able to chat about it in the same room. 
 

FAQs 
 
Q1: Is it compulsory for all the participants to have the latest installed SonyLiv Video Watch Party extension? 

 Yes, everyone joining the watch party has to install the extension in order for them to be able to participate in the watch party. 
 
Q2: Is it possible to watch live events especially sports with friends when using this extension?  

Absolutely! It is possible to initiate a ‘watch party’ for live sports events on SonyLiv and watch events in real-time all at once. 
 
Q3: Is this extension possible on mobile devices?  

Yes the SonyLiv Video Watch Party extension works on any device that supports SonyLiv including mobile devices so that you can connect with friends anywhere.
